plot: While Will continues to work with Alexei, Dr. Magnus has a visitor from her past with a terrible secret.

Will is still contemplating the job offer he's received from Dr. Helen Magnus. Her daughter Ashley has finally caught the boy who lived in the apartment where the two policemen were killed. His name is Alexei and Magnus asks Will to speak to the boy. Will's ability to quickly establish a rapport with him convinces Magnus he is the man she needs to work with her. Meanwhile, John Druitt, the man from Helen's past, finds a way to get into the sanctuary. He wants something from her and is willing to put Ashley in danger in order to get it. Helen tells Will of her own origins and of her previous relationship with Druitt, who is also known for something else.—garykmcd
